downloadTitle: System Center 2012 Management Pack for Windows Server 2012 R2 Windows Deployment Services
downloadDescription: ​The Windows Deployment Services Management Pack includes monitors, rules, views, tasks and knowledge for the monitoring of your Windows Deployment Services infrastructure for Windows Server 2012 R2.

detailsSection:
​The Windows Deployment Services Management Pack includes monitors, rules, views, tasks and knowledge for the monitoring of your Windows Deployment Services infrastructure for Windows Server 2012 R2.

Feature Summary
  • Windows Server 2012 R2 Support
  • Service Health Monitoring
  • State and Alert Views
  • Performance Monitoring
  • Alert Knowledge Base Information

Release History
  • 10/18/2013 - version 7.1.10100.0

systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • Windows Server 2012 R2 with Windows Deployment Services Role
    • This management pack is supported to run in System Center 2012 Operations Manager, System Center 2012 Operations Manager SP1 and System Center 2012 Operations Manager R2
installInstructionSection: ​Please refer to WDS 2012 R2 MP Guide for instructions.
